Hmm.. good point - the reason I did that is utility.  I was tired of getting a 
dozen "email me about samurai, thanks" emails a day, and I figured the pikes and 
clubs of the group here would keep the rabble at bay ;)  but adding links to 
specific answers in the FAQ is a very good idea, so I'll try to get to that. Too 
much to do, so little time :(
So, if anyone wants to come up with a FAQ question+answer or two, PLEASE feel 
free! I am always open to assistance, ideas, and thoughts.


-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Helm [mailto:junkmail@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 09, 2003 11:25 PM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Two ideas...


http://www.samurai-archives.com/contact.html

The problem here is that the answer to all the questions is either;

1. We cannot help you

or

2. Ask the Yahoo Samurai History list...

Perhaps we can help our very dedicated Webmaster to post some of the 
basics like what is a samurai (bushi), what is (was) Bushido?The 
answers being "read the article on death in the culture section" or 
some such. Clearly we cannot save all the unfortunates out there but, 
"though they be innumerable we must vow to save them all..."

-t
